results.query: I am looking for a COO for my company in China and I want to see if they are culturally a right fit for our company. Suggest me an assessment that they can complete in about an hour
results.rewrite:
SKILL: Operations Management, Strategic Planning, Financial Acumen, Business Development, Risk Management, Supply Chain Management, Technology Adoption, Data Analysis 
 SOFT: Leadership, Cross-cultural Communication, Adaptability, Problem-solving, Decision-making, Team Building, Negotiation, Emotional Intelligence, Conflict Resolution, Mentorship 
 JOBLEVEL: senior 
 DURATION: 60MIN 
 LANG: Mandarin Chinese, English 
 SUMMARY: A 60-minute assessment for a COO candidate in China focusing on cultural fit, leadership, and strategic thinking. The assessment will include a case study on market entry or operational expansion in China, requiring the candidate to analyze a scenario, propose a strategy, and address potential cultural challenges. This will be followed by a series of behavioral questions exploring their experience with cross-cultural teams, conflict resolution, and adaptability in a Chinese business context. The assessment will conclude with a brief role-play or simulation of a common operational challenge in China, allowing the candidate to demonstrate their problem-solving and communication skills.

parsed.skills: Operations Management, Strategic Planning, Financial Acumen, Business Development, Risk Management, Supply Chain Management, Technology Adoption, Data Analysis
parsed.soft_skills: Leadership, Cross-cultural Communication, Adaptability, Problem-solving, Decision-making, Team Building, Negotiation, Emotional Intelligence, Conflict Resolution, Mentorship
parsed.summary: A 60-minute assessment for a COO candidate in China focusing on cultural fit, leadership, and strategic thinking. The assessment will include a case study on market entry or operational expansion in China, requiring the candidate to analyze a scenario, propose a strategy, and address potential cultural challenges. This will be followed by a series of behavioral questions exploring their experience with cross-cultural teams, conflict resolution, and adaptability in a Chinese business context. The assessment will conclude with a brief role-play or simulation of a common operational challenge in China, allowing the candidate to demonstrate their problem-solving and communication skills.

 JOBLEVEL: senior 
 DURATION: 60MIN 
 LANG: Mandarin Chinese, English 
 SUMMARY: A 60-minute assessment for a COO candidate in China focusing on cultural fit, leadership, and strategic thinking. The assessment will include a case study on market entry or operational expansion in China, requiring the candidate to analyze a scenario, propose a strategy, and address potential cultural challenges. This will be followed by a series of behavioral questions exploring their experience with cross-cultural teams, conflict resolution, and adaptability in a Chinese business context. The assessment will conclude with a brief role-play or simulation of a common operational challenge in China, allowing the candidate to demonstrate their problem-solving and communication skills.

results.rewrite:
SKILL: Operations Management, Strategic Planning, Financial Acumen, Business Development, Risk Management, Supply Chain Management, Technology Adoption, Data Analysis 
 SOFT: Leadership, Cross-cultural Communication, Adaptability, Problem-solving, Decision-making, Negotiation, Team Building, Emotional Intelligence, Conflict Resolution, Mentorship 
 JOBLEVEL: senior

 LANG: Mandarin Chinese, English 
 SUMMARY: A 60-minute assessment for a COO candidate in China, focusing on cultural fit, leadership, and strategic thinking. The assessment will include a case study on navigating a business challenge in the Chinese market, a series of behavioral questions on cross-cultural communication and team management, and a short presentation on their vision for operational excellence within a Chinese company context. The goal is to evaluate their understanding of local business practices, their ability to lead diverse teams, and their alignment with the company's values.

results.query:
KEY RESPONSIBITILES:

Manage the sound-scape of the station through appropriate creative and marketing interventions to Increase or Maintain the listenership
Acts as an interface between Programming & sales team, thereby supporting the sales team by providing creative inputs in order to increase the overall ad spends by clients
Build brand Mirchi by ideating fresh programming initiatives on air campaigns, programming led on-ground events & new properties to ensure brand differentiation & thus increase brand recall at station level
Invest time in local RJs to grow & develop them as local celebrities
Through strong networking, must focus on identifying the best of local talent and ensure to bring the creative minds from the market on board with Mirchi
Build radio as a category for both listeners & advertisers
People Management
Identifying the right talent and investing time in developing them by frequent feedback on their performance
Monitor, Coach and mentor team members on a regular basis
Development of Jocks as per guidelines
Must have an eye to spot the local talent to fill up vacancies locally




TECHNICAL SKILLS & QUALIFICATION REQUIRED:

Graduation / Post Graduation (Any specialisation) with 8 -12 years of relevant experience
Experience in digital content conceptualisation
Strong branding focus
Must be well-read in variety of areas and must keep up with the latest events in the city / cluster / country
Must know to read, write & speak English 


PERSONAL ATTRIBUTES:

Excellent communication skills
Good interpersonal skills
People management


Suggest me some tests for the above jd. The duration should be at most 90 mins
results.rewrite:
SKILL: digital content conceptualisation, branding, content creation 
 SOFT: communication, interpersonal skills, people management, networking, leadership, creativity 
 JOBLEVEL: senior 
 DURATION: 90MIN 
 LANG: English 
 SUMMARY: The candidate will be responsible for managing the station's sound-scape, increasing listenership, acting as an interface between programming and sales, building the Mirchi brand through fresh initiatives, developing local RJs and talent, and managing a team.

parsed.skills: digital content conceptualisation, branding, content creation
parsed.soft_skills: communication, interpersonal skills, people management, networking, leadership, creativity
parsed.summary: The candidate will be responsible for managing the station's sound-scape, increasing listenership, acting as an interface between programming and sales, building the Mirchi brand through fresh initiatives, developing local RJs and talent, and managing a team.

 JOBLEVEL: senior

 SUMMARY: The candidate will be responsible for managing the station's sound-scape, increasing listenership, acting as an interface between programming and sales, building the Mirchi brand through fresh initiatives, developing local RJs and talent, and managing a team.

results.query:
KEY RESPONSIBITILES:

Manage the sound-scape of the station through appropriate creative and marketing interventions to Increase or Maintain the listenership
Acts as an interface between Programming & sales team, thereby supporting the sales team by providing creative inputs in order to increase the overall ad spends by clients
Build brand Mirchi by ideating fresh programming initiatives on air campaigns, programming led on-ground events & new properties to ensure brand differentiation & thus increase brand recall at station level
Invest time in local RJs to grow & develop them as local celebrities
Through strong networking, must focus on identifying the best of local talent and ensure to bring the creative minds from the market on board with Mirchi
Build radio as a category for both listeners & advertisers
People Management
Identifying the right talent and investing time in developing them by frequent feedback on their performance
Monitor, Coach and mentor team members on a regular basis
Development of Jocks as per guidelines
Must have an eye to spot the local talent to fill up vacancies locally




TECHNICAL SKILLS & QUALIFICATION REQUIRED:

Graduation / Post Graduation (Any specialisation) with 8 -12 years of relevant experience
Experience in digital content conceptualisation
Strong branding focus
Must be well-read in variety of areas and must keep up with the latest events in the city / cluster / country
Must know to read, write & speak English

Good interpersonal skills
People management


Suggest me some tests for the above jd. The duration should be at most 90 mins
results.rewrite:
SKILL: digital content conceptualisation, branding, content creation 
 SOFT: communication, interpersonal skills, people management, networking, leadership, creativity, strategic thinking 
 JOBLEVEL: senior 
 DURATION: 90MIN 
 LANG: English 
 SUMMARY: The candidate will be responsible for managing the station's sound-scape, increasing listenership, acting as an interface between programming and sales, building the Mirchi brand through fresh initiatives, developing local RJs and talent, and building radio as a category. They will also be responsible for people management, including identifying, developing, monitoring, coaching, and mentoring team members.

SKILL: digital content conceptualisation, branding, content creation 
 SOFT: communication, interpersonal skills, people management, networking, leadership, creativity, strategic thinking 
 JOBLEVEL: senior 
 DURATION: 90MIN 
 LANG: English 
 SUMMARY: This role requires a senior professional to manage the station's sound-scape, increase listenership, and act as an interface between programming and sales. Key responsibilities include building brand Mirchi through fresh programming initiatives, developing local RJs and talent, and growing radio as a category. The ideal candidate will have 8-12 years of relevant experience, strong branding focus, and excellent communication and people management skills.

SKILL: digital content conceptualisation, branding, content creation 
 SOFT: communication, interpersonal skills, people management, networking, leadership, creativity, strategic thinking 
 JOBLEVEL: senior 
 DURATION: 90MIN 
 LANG: English 
 SUMMARY: This role requires a senior professional to manage the station's sound-scape, increase listenership, and act as an interface between programming and sales. results.query:
KEY RESPONSIBITILES:

Manage the sound-scape of the station through appropriate creative and marketing interventions to Increase or Maintain the listenership
Acts as an interface between Programming & sales team, thereby supporting the sales team by providing creative inputs in order to increase the overall ad spends by clients
Build brand Mirchi by ideating fresh programming initiatives on air campaigns, programming led on-ground events & new properties to ensure brand differentiation & thus increase brand recall at station level
Invest time in local RJs to grow & develop them as local celebrities
Through strong networking, must focus on identifying the best of local talent and ensure to bring the creative minds from the market on board with Mirchi
Build radio as a category for both listeners & advertisers
People Management
Identifying the right talent and investing time in developing them by frequent feedback on their performance
Monitor, Coach and mentor team members on a regular basis
Development of Jocks as per guidelines
Must have an eye to spot the local talent to fill up vacancies locally




TECHNICAL SKILLS & QUALIFICATION REQUIRED:

Graduation / Post Graduation (Any specialisation) with 8 -12 years of relevant experience
Experience in digital content conceptualisation
Strong branding focus
Must be well-read in variety of areas and must keep up with the latest events in the city / cluster / country
Must know to read, write & speak English 


PERSONAL ATTRIBUTES:

Excellent communication skills
Good interpersonal skills
People management


Suggest me some tests for the above jd. The duration should be at most 90 mins
results.rewrite:
SKILL: digital content conceptualisation, branding, content creation, talent identification, talent development 
 SOFT: communication, interpersonal skills, people management, networking, leadership, creativity, strategic thinking 
 JOBLEVEL: senior 
 DURATION: 90MIN 
 LANG: English 
 SUMMARY: The candidate will be responsible for managing the station's sound-scape, increasing listenership, acting as an interface between programming and sales, building the Mirchi brand through fresh initiatives, developing local RJs and talent, and building radio as a category. They will also be responsible for people management, including identifying, developing, monitoring, coaching, and mentoring team members.
